title: Internal pipeline doesn't work with MSBuild server
body:
### Issue Description

The MSBuild server causes the MSBuildPipeline to fail.
There are two main reasons (and there could be others):
 - Terminal logger
 - Build checks


### Steps to Reproduce

Enable MSBuild server in azure pipeline like here:
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/11295

### Expected Behavior

Tests pass.

### Actual Behavior

Tests fail.

### Analysis

_No response_

### Versions & Configurations

_No response_

nodes.body:
Some commits in main later + adding it @rainersigwald's comment after not polluting the test environment by the MSBUILDSERVER variable, and it now passed.
The PR is now merged.
